description.dutch: Buldr en Forsetti komen Yri helpen.
description.english: Buldr and Forsetti come to Yri's aid.
description.french: Buldr et Forsetti viennent en aide à Yri.
description.german: Buldr und Forsetti kommen Yri zu Hilfe..
description.italian: Buldr e Forsetti giungono in aiuto di Yri.
description.japanese: バルダーとフォルセッティがイリを手伝いに来る。
description.latam: Ayuda a Dallr a afinar su laúd.
description.schinese: 布尔铎和福尔赛蒂前来帮助尤瑞。
description.spanish: Buldr y Forsetti vienen a ayudar a Yri.
description.tchinese: 布爾德和芙賽蒂來幫忙伊利了。
description.turkish: DBuldr ve Forsetti, Yri'nin yardımına koştu.

description.dutch: Praat Sven uit zijn blauwe-aderrazernij.
description.english: Talk Sven from his Blue Vein state.
description.french: Sortez Sven de son état de veine bleue.
description.german: Rede mit Sven und hole ihn aus seinem Blauader-Zustand..
description.italian: Salva Sven dalla vena blu parlandogli..
description.japanese: 青い血管状態からスヴェンを引き出す
description.spanish: Intenta convencer a Sven para que abandone su estado de vena azul.
description.tchinese: 跟斯溫講話，讓他免於藍血狀態
description.turkish: Konuşarak Sven'i Mavi Damar durumundan çıkar.

description.dutch: Red Forsetti van haar lot.
description.italian: Aiuta Forsetti a scampare alla sorte..
description.japanese: フォルセッティを運命から救う。
description.schinese: 拯救福尔赛蒂摆脱噩运。
description.spanish: Salva a Forsetti de su destino.
description.tchinese: 拯救芙賽蒂免於命運的摧殘。

description.dutch: Laat Eiryn haar eigen pad vinden.
description.english: Set Eiryn on her own path.
description.french: Guidez Eiryn sur sa propre voie.
description.german: Hilf Eiryn, ihren eigenen Weg einzuschlagen..
description.italian: Guida Eiryn verso la sua strada.
description.japanese: エイリンを己の道に歩ませる。
description.spanish: Haz que Eiryn encuentre su propio camino.
description.tchinese: 讓艾琳踏上自己的旅程。

displayName.spanish: La última que queda de pie

description.dutch: Soms ontkom je niet aan een offer om de wereld te redden.
description.english: Sometimes sacrifice is necessary to save the world.
description.french: Parfois, il faut savoir faire des sacrifices pour sauver le monde.
description.german: Manchmal muss man Opfer bringen, um die Welt zu retten.
description.italian: A volte è necessario un sacrificio per salvare il mondo.
description.japanese: 世界を救うためには、時には犠牲が必要。
description.koreana: 세상을 구하기 위해선 어느 정도의 희생은 필요한 법입니다.
description.latam: Protege el Árbol de la Vida.
description.schinese: 有时为了拯救世界，牺牲是必要的。
description.spanish: A veces hay que sacrificarse para salvar el mundo.
description.tchinese: 要拯救世界，有時就得做出犧牲。
description.turkish: Bazen, dünyayı kurtarmak için fedakarlık yapmak gerekir.

description.dutch: Het is voorbij. Je kunt nu naar huis.
description.english: It's over. You can go home now.
description.french: Tout est terminé. Vous pouvez rentrer chez vous.
description.german: Es ist vorbei. Du kannst nach Hause gehen.
description.italian: È finita. Ora puoi tornare a casa.
description.japanese: 終わりだ。家に帰ろう。
description.koreana: 모든 게 끝났습니다. 이제 집에 가도 좋습니다.
description.spanish: Se acabó. Ya puedes irte a casa.
description.turkish: Her şey bitti. Artık eve dönebilirsin.

description.dutch: Vaarwel, kleine vriend.
description.japanese: さようなら、友よ。

description.dutch: Dit is het einde.
description.japanese: これで終わり。

description.latam: Logra <nobr>90 %</nobr> de aciertos en al menos 15 batallas en Arena.
description.schinese: 帮助达尔给他的鲁特琴调音。
description.spanish: Ayuda a Dallr a afinar su laúd.
description.turkish: Dallr'ın udunu akort etmesine yardımcı ol.

description.dutch: Lees 30 verhaaldelen of boeken.
description.japanese: 30のストーリーノードや本を読む。
description.latam: Libra tu primera batalla en Arena.
description.schinese: 阅读 30 个剧情介绍或图书。
description.tchinese: 閱讀 30 個故事節點或書籍。
